author: Juliegrace Brufke
title: Coronavirus in Congress: Lawmakers who have tested positive
description: The coronavirus has hit Capitol Hill.Lawmakers in both parties, and in both chambers, have tested positive.Below is a list of all members of Congress who have contracted the virus. It will be updated if more...
content:
The coronavirus has hit Capitol Hill.
Lawmakers in both parties, and in both chambers, have tested positive.
Below is a list of all members of Congress who have contracted the virus. It will be updated if more lawmakers announce they have COVID-19.
